item.slimylocomotion.earth_slime_sling.t:
Charge up, aim low, get flinging!
Use the slime boots if you value your life!
item.slimylocomotion.sky_slime_sling.too:
Charge up, let go, get back in the air!
Use the slime boots if you value your life!
item.slimylocomotion.ender_slime_sling.t: Charge up, point it at a wall, come out the other side!
